product_description: Matilda Veneer is Australia’s leading manufacturer of timber veneer.

product_categories.category_name: Ceiling and Soffit (Systems and Finishes)
Internal Wall Linings, finishes and partition systems
Joinery and benchtop materials and systems
Timber

standard_dimensions: Varies depending on log size and cut
price_adjustment_structure: Pricing varies withing the species based on quality of the veneer.

certifications.certification: Programme for the Endorsement of Forest Certification

compostable_conditions: Product is 100% timber, so fully compostable.
minimisation_design_strategy: Selection of logs of the required length for your project to minimise wastage.
modern_slavery_comments: Core labour requirements are assessed annually as part of our FSC certification process.

detailed_certifications.certification: Programme for the Endorsement of Forest Certification

specific_installation_methods: A natural sealant and compostable substrate should be selected to ensure full compostability at end of life.
applied_finish_required_description: Once fabricated, the timber veneer will need to be sealed.  There are various options depending on the level of protection required, ranging from oils and waxes through to 2 pack polyurethane.
type_of_packaging: Re-usable timber pallets and plastic wrap for waterproofing and securing is used when transporting.
